data.title: B Site Execute Recon Bolt From B Short
data.description: Here's an execute Recon Bolt that scans many of the commonly held angles on Site, while limiting a large number of the angles that players can play from without being scanned. It's especially useful since it lands in an awkward spot for players on Site to react to - since it lands high up behind where players would typically be playing on Site.

data.title: A Showers to A Tetris Shock Bolt
data.description: This is a good shock dart to stop anyone from defusing or planting the bomb.

data.title: A Showers to A Site Default Spike Plant Double Shock Bolt
data.description: This is a good shock dart to kill anyone planting or defusing the bomb on A Site at the default plant spot.
